app_description: Speak Translator Supports more than 100 languages such as English Japanese French Russian Spanish Portuguese etc. supports text translation document translation voice translation to meet your all round translation needs and there are desktop widgets to help you record completed translations Make your work more efficient. The main function Text translation: supports 104 languages input text can be translated it is a powerful assistant for your work. Document translation: Support word pdf and other document translation without entering text quickly and efficiently translate documents and obtain high quality translations in real time. Speech translation: No need to enter text just say what you want to translate you can get accurate results and make your communication more fluid. Desktop component: The text widget can help you record the translated content at any time allowing you to view the translated content anytime anywhere. Speak Translator Pro automatic subscription service description Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto renew is turned off 24 hours before the end of the current period. Accounts will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period and renewal fees will be provided. Subscriptions can be managed by the user. Auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase. During the active subscription period cancellation of the current subscription is not allowed.
